titles.title: Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
To redesignate the Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site as the "Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park", and for other purposes.
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park Redesignation Act
This bill redesignates the Saint-Gaudens National Historic Site, in New Hampshire, as the "Saint-Gaudens National Historical Park."
